How orbital satellite mega constellations could change astronomy forever
description: Satellite megaconstellations are increasingly impacting astronomical observations. title: Investing FOMO: How do you stop it from running your money life? Explained
description: When markets boom, wedding conversations shift to stock tips, fueling FOMO. Investors often chase recent gains, entering late and exiting during downturns, leading to lower actual returns. A disciplined approach, focusing on long-term goals and a small 'mad money' allocation for experiments, is key to navigating market hype.

Netflix to acquire Warner Bros: Why it is a BIG deal
description: Two and a half decades later, that humble mail-order start-up is preparing to buy the studio that helped build modern Hollywood itself. Netflix’s planned acquisition of Warner Bros – the century-old home of Casablanca, Harry Potter, DC superheroes, The Lord of the Rings (via New Line), HBO and control of classics like The Wizard of Oz – for an enterprise value of roughly 82.7 billion dollars marks a transformative moment in entertainment history. For the first time, a company that began its life shipping DVDs is about to take ownership of a film and television library that has shaped global culture for a hundred years.

title: Ryan Kesler faces new trial decision over criminal sexual charges
description: Former Vancouver Canucks and Anaheim Ducks forward Ryan Kesler is officially headed toward trial after a new court decision on Thursday confirmed the case will move forward. Kesler faces two misdemeanor counts of fourth-degree criminal sexual conduct tied to a January incident in Orchard Lake, Michigan. The latest ruling reinforces the prosecution’s position, while Kesler continues to maintain his not-guilty plea.

description: A simple sip of water can turn life-threatening, leading to aspiration pneumonia when liquid enters the lungs instead of the stomach. This condition, often caused by bacteria in aspirated material, inflames lung tissue and impairs breathing.  Elderly individuals and those with swallowing difficulties are particularly at risk. Early recognition and prevention are key.

title: Sabalenka & Frangulis net worth: Earnings, endorsements and ventures
description: Tennis star Aryna Sabalenka and her boyfriend, Oakberry founder Georgios Frangulis, are a financially successful couple. Sabalenka boasts a net worth in the high teens of millions from her WTA career and endorsements, while Frangulis's stake in his rapidly expanding açaí company places him in the multi-million-dollar range. Their combined wealth is estimated to be in the tens of millions.

title: Candace Owens slammed for ‘running scared’ from Charlie Kirk livestream
description: Candace Owens is facing criticism for contradicting herself. She publicly offered to debate Turning Point USA (TPUSA) leadership anytime, anywhere. However, when TPUSA scheduled a livestream to address her claims, Owens pushed back on the logistics. Critics accuse her of creating drama rather than accepting the challenge she initiated. The situation has become a test of consistency for the commentator.

title: 'Hidma was trapped': Maoists say contractors acted as informers; committee rejects encounter claim
description: Maoists claim top leader Madvi Hidma was trapped and killed by police informers, including contractors, after seeking medical treatment. The outfit alleges a staged encounter and demands a judicial inquiry into Hidma's and Shankar's deaths, dismissing claims by former MLA Manish Kunjam and activist Soni Sori as baseless. They assert a coordinated joint operation.

title: ‘Not a simple divorce’: Woman accused of killing mother-in-law seeks Rs 45L alimony; HC halts payout
description: Gujarat High Court has temporarily halted a family court's order for Dipak Agrawal to pay Rs 45 lakh in alimony to his estranged wife, Nikita Agrawal. Nikita is accused of murdering her mother-in-law, and Dipak argued against paying maintenance to someone facing such a grave charge. The court cited the serious nature of the allegations in its decision.

description: Travis Kelce recently spoke about his trip to Lake Como with Taylor Swift. He described the beautiful scenery and the warmth of the local people. Kelce expressed his joy and wonder at the experience, finding a new appreciation for life's pace. George Clooney also joined the conversation, sharing his own fondness for the Italian region.

title: Jeff Bezos' ex-wife’s donations: Scott cuts Amazon stake; gives millions to DEI causes
description: MacKenzie Scott has significantly reduced her Amazon stake, donating billions to diversity, equity, and inclusion initiatives. Her recent $80 million gift to Howard University highlights her focus on substantial contributions to DEI and disaster relief causes. Despite these large donations, Scott remains a prominent philanthropist.
